data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Campodonico, Juan F. (2018): New genus and species of brachypterous planthopper of the tribe Elicini (Hemiptera: Fulgoroidea: Tropiduchidae) from Chile. Zootaxa 4413 (3): 586-592, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4413.3.12|2 occurrences
